Key Match Events: Soto hit a 402-foot home run in the eighth inning to give the Yankees a 2-1 lead
Salvador Perez tied the score with a sacrifice fly in the bottom of the 11th inning
Luke Weaver pitched 1 2/3 scoreless innings in the bottom of the 10th and 11th innings
Chisholm delivered the winning RBI single in the bottom of the 11th inning
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge is 11-for-53 in his past 15 games with zero home runs
Soto entered the game in an 11-for-52 slump
Boone opted for Clay Holmes in the top of the seventh despite Kansas City's three right-handed hitters coming up next
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Boone highlighted the importance of strong bullpen performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Juan Soto hopped down the first-base line and collapsed midway between home plate and first base after getting hurt
The game went into extras and the bottom of the 11th inning after Yankees reliever Luke Weaver pitched 1 2/3 scoreless innings
The win extended the Yankees' lead to 1 1/2 games in the American League East
